div.pre: 1770 Dura-Europus, Mesopotamia, 1933- (354) 1934 Burial: c. 187 B.C. (Le Rider) Contents: 207 AE. Pot hoard Antiochus III: Seleuceia ad Tigrim 1, Susa? 1, Antiocheia 204, Tyre 1 Disposition: Yale? â€ Bellinger, Excav. Dura-Europos 6 (New Haven, 1949), pp. 178-9 Seyrig, RN 1958, p. 172 Le Rider, Suse, p. 58 The coin ascribed by Bellinger to Mithra- dates I of Parthia has been attributed to Antiochus III by Seyrig and Le Rider and may have been struck at Susa
